props.modelValue: Set the v-model to `true` to show modal or `false` to hide it.
props.title: Title displayed in the modals header
props.primaryButton: Attributes of the primary v-button component. See documentation for the valid values
props.secondaryButton: Attributes of the secondary v-button component. See documentation for the valid values
props.primaryButtonClose: If `true` clicking primary button emits the @input:secondaryButtonClick event and closes modal. If `false` modal is not closed after emitting event
props.secondaryButtonClose: If `true` clicking primary button emits the @input:primaryButtonClick event and closes modal. If `false` modal is not closed after emitting event
props.justifyButtons: Use this prop to place buttons in the footer. Valid values are: 'start', 'end', 'center', 'between', 'around', 'evenly'
props.noCloseButton: Disables the 'X' button in modal header
props.staticBackdrop: If `true` modal dialog cannot be closed by clicking outside of it
props.noHeader: Do not render the header if `true`
props.noFooter: Do not render the footer if `true`
props.position: Position of the modal. Valid values are: 'top', 'center' or 'bottom'
props.size: Size of the modal on medium and larger screens. Valid values are: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl' or 'fit'
props.closeButton: Attributes of the v-close-button component. See documentation for the valid values
props.transition: Sets the animation effect when showing or hiding modal. Valid values are: 'fade', 'fade-slide', 'fade-scale' or `empty string` to disable animations. Animation speed can be set in the `--modal-transition-duration` css variable.
props.modModal: Style of the main modal element
props.modHeader: Style of the modal header element
props.modFooter: Style of the modal footer element
props.modContent: Style of the content part of modal element

emits.input:static-backdrop-click: Emmited after clicking backdrop if the `static-backdrop` prop is `true`

slots.modal: Swaps the entire default content of the v-modal. Slot props: `close()`
